metadata.title: CVE-2013-4349
metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2012-4540.  Reason: This candidate was MERGED into CVE-2012-4540, since it was later discovered that it affected an additional version, but it does not constitute a regression error.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2012-4540 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.
